result:
<v-flex xs12 sm6 md4 d-flex>
  <v-autocomplete
    v-model="selectComponentes"
    :items="componentes"
    outline
    label="Componentes do Instrumento"
    multiple
    item-text="componente"
    item-value="componente"
    chips
    color="teal darken-3"
    :rules="[() => !!componentes || 'Este campo precisa ser selecionado!']"
    single-line
    append-icon="far fa-list-alt"
    @change="Selecionar(selectComponentes)"
  >
    <template slot="selection" slot-scope="data">
      <v-chip
        :selected="data.selected"
        :key="JSON.stringify(data.item.id)"
        close
        color="teal darken-3"
        class="chip--select-multi white--text"
        @input="data.parent.selectItem(data.item.componente)"
      >{{ data.item.componente }}</v-chip>
    </template>
    <template slot="item" slot-scope="data">
      <v-flex xs10 sm10>
        <v-list-tile>
          <v-list-tile-content v-html="data.item.componente"></v-list-tile-content>
        </v-list-tile>
      </v-flex>

      <v-flex xs2 sm2>
        <v-btn
          flat
          style="cursor:pointer"
          icon
          color="red"
          @click="DeletarComponente(data.item.id,data.item.componente)"
        >
          <v-icon>fas fa-trash-alt</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-flex>
    </template>
  </v-autocomplete>

  <cad-componente v-on:componentes="AtualizarComponentes()"></cad-componente>
</v-flex>
